course_description: The Qur'an in translation, from historical and literary perspectives, looking at its use in Islam, its language, stylistics, modes of narrative, and its relationship to Jewish, Christian, and Arabian traditions.
schedule_location: TTh 1pm-2:15pm in New Psyc Bldg 220 (36 Eagle Ro
